definition: it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: Reportedly, the Chinese people in a New Year's Eve see the old habits.
sentences.chinese: 据称，中国民间在除夕有守岁的习惯。

sentences.english: Today Bandhavgarh claims to maintain the highest density of tigers in the country.
sentences.chinese: 如今，班达迦据称保持着国内最高的老虎密度。

sentences.english: Jackman reportedly requested to have Luhrmann stage the Oscar number.
sentences.chinese: 据称杰克曼竭力邀请鲁尔曼执导奥斯卡舞台。

sentences.english: His studies of volcanoes on the Fijian island of Kadavu indicated they had not been active for tens of thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 他研究斐济卡达屋岛上据称几万年未活动的火山。

sentences.english: He reportedly divvied up key spheres of interest, such as oil, among his 6 sons.
sentences.chinese: 据称，他的6个儿子瓜分了石油等国家命脉产业。

sentences.english: It's said to be anti-capitalist, with the undertone that carries of being anti-American.
sentences.chinese: 据称这是反资本主义，潜含有反美的意味。

sentences.english: It is said the Widsets has over 4 million users in China already.
sentences.chinese: 据称维信在中国已经拥有400多万的用户。

sentences.english: This practice is difficult to confirm its alleged illegality .
sentences.chinese: 据称这种做法还难以确认其非法性。

sentences.english: Much of the alleged bribery was connected to fund-raising efforts in recent election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 据称这些贿金的大部分都和近来竞选活动的筹资有关。

sentences.english: The prisoners' favorites included meat Kebab and pizza, the official said.
sentences.chinese: 据称囚犯们最喜欢的外卖是羊肉串和比萨饼。

sentences.english: Its believed to be the largest foliage in Britain with 11ft span.
sentences.chinese: 这张足有11英尺宽的叶面据称是英国最大的叶子。

sentences.english: Formally announced in late September, the lay offs reportedly began this week.
sentences.chinese: 科特说去年九月宣布的大裁员据称将于这周开始。

sentences.english: DMAE is reported to increase intelligence in children.
Materazzi, meanwhile, was quoted as denying the terrorist comment.
sentences.chinese: 然而，据称马特拉齐否认他说过这样的话。

sentences.english: Hundreds are alleged to have been killed or maimed.
sentences.chinese: 还有上百人据称已被杀害或致残。

sentences.english: He also supposedly asked state workers to ring the woman.
sentences.chinese: 据称他也曾令政府工作人员给该名女性打电话。

definition: according to belief/it is believed that
according to a report/It is reported that...
it is rumored that .../it is reported that ...
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
apart from this/in addition to this
